data.title: send flowers Portland, Oregon: Portland Florist since 1938 Gifford's Flowers downtown
data.meta_description: Premiere Portland Florist, Portland's busiest Florist, Gifford's Flowers (Gifford-Doving Florist) has been a Portland Florist since 1938. Gifford's Flowers offers a wide Selection of High End and Everyday Flowers, Distinctive Floral Arrangements,  Fruit and Gourmet Baskets
data.text:
Most orders received by 12:30 p.m. Pacific Time Zone can be delivered that same day. We also offer "express deliveries''. Please call (503) 222 9193 and one of our staff will assist you if you need a timed or express delivery. We deliver twice daily, four days a week to: Portland, Lake Oswego, Beaverton, Hillsboro, Aloha, Tigard, West Linn, Tualatin, Wilsonville, Oregon City, Milwaukie, Clackamas, Gresham as well as Vancouver, Washington. A delivery fee will be added to the Total order. Weddings and events delivered seven days a week.

Gifford's Flowers can also help you send flowers throughout the United States. Please note: Certain arrangements and flowers may not be available outside of the Portland Metro area. We do work hard to try and find the perfect florist to fill your order. Call (503) 222-9193 if you have any questions concerning availability or pricing.
